public_base_url.description: Base URL used to build Telegram's webhook endpoint.

webhook_path.description: Optional path appended to the base URL.

secret_token.description: Optional secret token to surface to Telegram when registering the webhook.

api_base_url.description: Optional override for the Telegram API base URL.

dry_run.description: If true, skip the call to setWebhook even when the paths differ.
